en.BLOCK_USER_MESSAGE: Dear {{Name}}, you have been blocked from using {{application}}. Kindly contact the customer support for more information.
en.UNBLOCK_USER_MESSAGE: Dear {{Name}}, you have been Unblocked from using {{application}}
en.FORGOT_PASSWORD_LINK: Hey {{customerName}}, use this link to reset your password to login {{application}} {{forgotPasswordLink}}

ASSIGN_PICKER.title: New order has been assigned !
ASSIGN_PICKER.body: Hey {{pickerName}}, a new order has been assigned to you !

ORDER_ARRIVED.title: Order Arrived
ORDER_ARRIVED.body: Hey, A new order {{bookingId}} has arrived.

ORDER_ACCEPTED.title: Order Accepted
ORDER_ACCEPTED.body: Hey {{customerName}}, your order has been accepted.

ORDER_REJECTED.title: Order Rejected
ORDER_REJECTED.body: Hey {{customerName}}, your order has been rejected due to {{cancellationReason}}. Sorry we won't be able to deliver this order.

TEST_NOTIFICATION.title: Dummy test notification
TEST_NOTIFICATION.body: Hey {{customerName}}, ignore its just a test notification

SLOT_EDITED.title: Delivery time changed
SLOT_EDITED.body: Hey {{customerName}}, your delivery time has been to {{deliveryTime}}, changed for Order Number {{bookingId}}

ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK.title: Items out of stock
ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK.body: Hey {{customerName}}, Some of the products in your order are missing, please open to choose replacements!

ORDER_CANCELLED.title: Order cancelled
ORDER_CANCELLED.body: Hey {{pickerName}}, Order Number {{bookingId}} has been cancelled by customer.

ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK_EMAIL.title: Items out of stock
ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK_EMAIL.body: Hey {{customerName}}, some of the items you ordered for for Order Number {{bookingId}} are out of stock, Use this link to edit Order {{editOrderLink}}.

INVOICE_EMAIL.title: Order invoice
INVOICE_EMAIL.body: Hey {{customerName}}, some of the items you ordered for for Order Number {{bookingId}} are out of stock, Use this link to edit Order {{editOrderLink}}.

CUSTOMER_ORDER_CANCELLED.title: Order cancelled
CUSTOMER_ORDER_CANCELLED.body: Hey {{customerName}}, your order {{bookingId}} has been cancelled due to the unavailability of the items, you will get the refund if you have paid already.

CUSTOMER_ORDER_EDITED.title: Order edited
CUSTOMER_ORDER_EDITED.body: Hey {{customerName}}, your order {{bookingId}} has been edited due to the unavailability of the items, you will get the refund if you have paid already.

ORDER_ACCEPTED_BY_DRIVER.title: Order accepted
ORDER_ACCEPTED_BY_DRIVER.body: Hey {{customerName}}, your order {{bookingId}} has been assigned and {{driverName}} is your delivery agent.

ORDER_PICKED_BY_DRIVER.title: Order picked
ORDER_PICKED_BY_DRIVER.body: Hey {{customerName}}, your order {{bookingId}} picked by the {{driverName}} from the store.

ORDER_ON_THE_WAY.title: Order on the way
ORDER_ON_THE_WAY.body: {{driverName}} is on the way with your order.

DIRVER_ON_THE_WAY_TO_STORRE.title: Driver reaching store
DIRVER_ON_THE_WAY_TO_STORRE.body: {{driverName}} is on the way to the store for your order {{bookingId}}.

DRIVER_ARRIVED.title: Delivery agent  has arrived
DRIVER_ARRIVED.body: Hey {{customerName}}, {{driverName}} has arrived and wating at the door.

STORE_ORDER_CANCELLED.title: Order cancelled
STORE_ORDER_CANCELLED.body: Hey, The order {{bookingId}} has been cancelled

ar.BLOCK_USER_MESSAGE: حبيب {{Name}}, تم حظرك من استخدام {{application}}. المعلومات يرجى الاتصال بدعم العملاء للحصول على مزيد من
ar.UNBLOCK_USER_MESSAGE: حبيب {{Name}}, تم إلغاء حظرك من استخدام {{application}}
ar.FORGOT_PASSWORD_LINK: مرحبًا {{customerName}} ، استخدم هذا الرابط لإعادة تعيين كلمة المرور لتسجيل الدخول {{forgotPasswordLink}}

ASSIGN_PICKER.title: تم تعيين أمر جديد !
ASSIGN_PICKER.body: مرحيا {{pickerName}}, تم تعيين أمر جديد لك !

ORDER_REJECTED.title: تم رفض الأمر
ORDER_REJECTED.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, تم رفض طلبك بسبب {{cancellationReason}}. آسف أننا لن نتمكن من تسليم هذا الطلب.

TEST_NOTIFICATION.title: Dummy test notification
TEST_NOTIFICATION.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, ignore its just a test notification

SLOT_EDITED.title: تغير وقت التسليم
SLOT_EDITED.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, وكان وقت التسليم الخاص بك إلى  {{deliveryTime}} , تم تغييره لرقم الطلب {{bookingId}}

ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK.title: البنود من المخزون
ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, بعض المنتجات في طلبك مفقودة, الرجاء فتح لاختيار بدائل!

ORDER_CANCELLED.title: تم إلغاء الأمر
ORDER_CANCELLED.body: مرحيا {{pickerName}},  رقم الطلب {{bookingId}} تم إلغاء من قبل العميل

ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK_EMAIL.title: البنود من المخزون
ITEMS_OUT_OF_STOCK_EMAIL.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, بعض العناصر التي طلبتها لرقم الطلب {{bookingId}} هي من المخزون , استخدم هذا الرابط لتحرير الأمر {{editOrderLink}}

INVOICE_EMAIL.title: أمر الفاتورة
INVOICE_EMAIL.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, بعض العناصر التي طلبتها لرقم الطلب {{bookingId}} هي من المخزون , استخدم هذا الرابط لتحرير الأمر {{editOrderLink}}

CUSTOMER_ORDER_CANCELLED.title: تم إلغاء الأمر
CUSTOMER_ORDER_CANCELLED.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, طلبك   {{bookingId}} تم إلغاء بسبب عدم توفر العناصر , سوف تحصل على استرداد إذا كنت قد دفعت بالفعل

CUSTOMER_ORDER_EDITED.title: ترتيب التحرير
CUSTOMER_ORDER_EDITED.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, طلبك   {{bookingId}} تم تحريرها بسبب عدم توافر العناصر , سوف تحصل على استرداد إذا كنت قد دفعت بالفعل

ORDER_ACCEPTED_BY_DRIVER.title: الطلب المقبول
ORDER_ACCEPTED_BY_DRIVER.body: مرحيا {{customerName}}, طلبك   {{bookingId}} تم تعيين و  {{driverName}}  هو وكيل التسليم الخاص بك

STORE_ORDER_CANCELLED.title: Order cancelled
STORE_ORDER_CANCELLED.body: Hey, The order {{bookingId}} has been cancelled
